{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\cocoartf949\cocoasubrtf350 {\fonttbl\f0\fnil\fcharset0 LucidaGrande;} {\colortbl;\red255\green255\blue255;\red0\green0\blue238;} \deftab720 \pard\pardeftab720\sa80\ql\qnatural
\f0\b\fs36 \cf0 OpenThesaurus Deutsch Lexikon-Plugin \fs38 \ \pard\pardeftab720\sa320\ql\qnatural
\b0\fs24 \cf0 Version: 2008.12.09 - OS X 10.5 \fs28 \
\fs26 Dieses Plugin erweitert Apples Lexikon-Programm (Dictionary.app) um einen \b deutschen Thesaurus \b0 .\ Der vom Plugin bereitgestellte Thesaurus basiert auf dem Online-Thesaurus {\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "http://www.openthesaurus.de/"}}{\fldrslt \cf2 \ul \ulc2 www.openthesaurus.de}} von Daniel Naber.\ Das Python-Skript zur Umwandlung der OpenThesaurus-W\'f6rterbuchdatei in ein Apple-Lexikon-Plugin wurde von Wolfgang Reszel entwickelt.\
\itap1\trowd \taflags1 \trgaph108\trleft-108 \trbrdrt\brdrnil \trbrdrl\brdrnil \trbrdrr\brdrnil \clvertalc \clshdrawnil \clwWidth2200\clftsWidth3 \clbrdrt\brdrnil \clbrdrl\brdrnil \clbrdrb\brdrnil \clbrdrr\brdrnil \clpadl100 \clpadr100 \gaph\cellx4320 \clvertalc \clshdrawnil \clwWidth6400\clftsWidth3 \clbrdrt\brdrnil \clbrdrl\brdrnil \clbrdrb\brdrnil \clbrdrr\brdrnil \clpadl100 \clpadr100 \gaph\cellx8640 \pard\intbl\itap1\pardeftab720\ql\qnatural
\b \cf0 Updates:\cell \pard\intbl\itap1\pardeftab720\ql\qnatural \cf0 Support und Quellcode \b0 : \b \cell \row
\itap1\trowd \taflags1 \trgaph108\trleft-108 \trbrdrl\brdrnil \trbrdrt\brdrnil \trbrdrr\brdrnil \clvertalc \clshdrawnil \clwWidth2200\clftsWidth3 \clbrdrt\brdrnil \clbrdrl\brdrnil \clbrdrb\brdrnil \clbrdrr\brdrnil \clpadl100 \clpadr100 \gaph\cellx4320 \clvertalc \clshdrawnil \clwWidth6400\clftsWidth3 \clbrdrt\brdrnil \clbrdrl\brdrnil \clbrdrb\brdrnil \clbrdrr\brdrnil \clpadl100 \clpadr100 \gaph\cellx8640 \pard\intbl\itap1\pardeftab720\ql\qnatural {\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "http://www.tekl.de"}}{\fldrslt \cf0 www.tekl.de}}\cell \pard\intbl\itap1\pardeftab720\sa320\ql\qnatural {\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "http://apple-dictionary-plugins.googlecode.com/"}}{\fldrslt \b0 \cf2 apple-dictionary-plugins.googlecode.com}}\cell \lastrow\row \pard\pardeftab720\ql\qnatural
\b0\fs22 \cf0 \ Die W\'f6rterbuch-Datei von OpenThesaurus unterliegt der \fs20 {\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "http://creativecommons.org/licenses/LGPL/2.1/"}}{\fldrslt CC-GNU LGPL}}.\ Das Lexikon-Plugin unterliegt der GPLv3 (siehe n\'e4chste Seite).}

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\cocoartf949\cocoasubrtf350 {\fonttbl\f0\fnil\fcharset0 LucidaGrande;\f1\fswiss\fcharset0 ArialMT;} {\colortbl;\red255\green255\blue255;\red51\green51\blue51;\red0\green0\blue238;} \deftab720 \pard\pardeftab720\sa80\ql\qnatural
\f0\b\fs36 \cf0 OpenThesaurus German Dictionary Plugin \b0\fs38 \ \pard\pardeftab720\sa320\ql\qnatural
\fs24 \cf0 Version: 2008.12.09 - OS X 10.5 \fs28 \
\fs26 This plugin extends Apple's Dictionary Application with a \b German thesaurus \b0 .\ The content of this plugin is based on the online thesaurus \f1\fs22 \cf2 \f0\fs26 \cf0 {\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "http://www.openthesaurus.de/"}}{\fldrslt \cf3 \ul \ulc3 www.openthesaurus.de}} by Daniel Naber.\ The Python script to convert the OpenThesaurus dictionary into a dictionary plugin was developed by Wolfgang Reszel.\
\itap1\trowd \taflags1 \trgaph108\trleft-108 \trbrdrt\brdrnil \trbrdrl\brdrnil \trbrdrr\brdrnil \clvertalc \clshdrawnil \clwWidth2200\clftsWidth3 \clbrdrt\brdrnil \clbrdrl\brdrnil \clbrdrb\brdrnil \clbrdrr\brdrnil \clpadl100 \clpadr100 \gaph\cellx4320 \clvertalc \clshdrawnil \clwWidth6400\clftsWidth3 \clbrdrt\brdrnil \clbrdrl\brdrnil \clbrdrb\brdrnil \clbrdrr\brdrnil \clpadl100 \clpadr100 \gaph\cellx8640 \pard\intbl\itap1\pardeftab720\ql\qnatural
\b \cf0 Updates:\cell \pard\intbl\itap1\pardeftab720\ql\qnatural \cf0 Support and source code \b0 : \b \cell \row
\itap1\trowd \taflags1 \trgaph108\trleft-108 \trbrdrl\brdrnil \trbrdrt\brdrnil \trbrdrr\brdrnil \clvertalc \clshdrawnil \clwWidth2200\clftsWidth3 \clbrdrt\brdrnil \clbrdrl\brdrnil \clbrdrb\brdrnil \clbrdrr\brdrnil \clpadl100 \clpadr100 \gaph\cellx4320 \clvertalc \clshdrawnil \clwWidth6400\clftsWidth3 \clbrdrt\brdrnil \clbrdrl\brdrnil \clbrdrb\brdrnil \clbrdrr\brdrnil \clpadl100 \clpadr100 \gaph\cellx8640 \pard\intbl\itap1\pardeftab720\ql\qnatural {\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "http://www.tekl.de"}}{\fldrslt \cf0 www.tekl.de}}\cell \pard\intbl\itap1\pardeftab720\sa320\ql\qnatural {\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "http://apple-dictionary-plugins.googlecode.com/"}}{\fldrslt \b0 \cf3 apple-dictionary-plugins.googlecode.com}}\cell \lastrow\row \pard\pardeftab720\ql\qnatural
\b0\fs22 \cf0 \ The source dictionary from OpenThesaurus is licensed under {\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "http://creativecommons.org/licenses/LGPL/2.1/"}}{\fldrslt \fs20 CC-GNU LGPL}} \fs20 .\ The dictionary plugin is licensed under the GPLv3 (see next page).}

requirement.message:
Sie benötigen OS X 10.5 (Leopard) oder höher.

Installation not possible!
You need OS X 10.5 (Leopard) or later.
Bitte wählen Sie ein Volume, wo OS X 10.5 (Leopard) installiert ist.\n\nPlease select a Volume where OS X 10.5 (Leopard) is installed.
